snippet.title: Watch Dogs Exposed E3 2013 Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch Dogs "Exposed" Official E3 trailer

Ubisoft has released a new trailer for Watch Dogs official trailer called "Exposed" at E3 2013 conference, done by DIGIC.

"Who you know, what you've done, where you've been... As Aiden Pearce monitors your digital trail, your secrets won't stay secret long."

Developer: Ubisoft Montreal
Publisher: Ubisoft
Release date: June 10, 2013

Best Trailer/Opener Award at Animago Awards 2013, Berlin, Germany
Animated Com Award's Technology Prize at 21. International Trickfilm Festival 2014, Stuttgart, Germany 
Listed for screening at Siggraph Asia 2013 Electronic Theater, Hong Kong, China
